name: Qorma Recipe | Masala TV
ingredients: Ingredients for Qorma Recipe: Mutton 1 kg Cinnamon 3 pcs Bay leaf 1 Cloves 8 Green cardamom ½ tsp Black pepper 8 Maze ¼ tsp Onion 1 large sliced Brown onion grinded 4 tbsp Garlic 15 cloves Ginger 2 inch piece Coriander seeds 2 tsp heaped Button red chilies whole 12 Salt 2 tsp level All spice 1 tsp Oil 3/4 cup 1 cup yogurt
instructions: Boil mutton with whole spices and 3 cups of water for 30 mins Grind together 1 large onion, ginger garlic, coriander seeds Add whole red chilies into a fine paste. Heat oil, put grinded paste, fry for 5 mins Add in the boiled mutton with 1 cup salt, yogurt, brown onion, crushed and all spice Cover and cook on low heat stirring occasionally for 15 mins till gravy thick and oil comes on top.
